amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being expended on specific elements of the National Security Personnel System.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to waive or modify regulations promulgated under chapter 43, 71, 75,or 77 of title 5, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
